scripts.build: npm run clone && npm run rename && npm run abaplint
scripts.abaplint: cp ./setup/abaplint.jsonc dist && cd dist && npx abaplint && cd ..
scripts.rename_frontend: node ./build/frontend_renaming/copy_rename.js && cd build/frontend_renaming && node replace_hashes.js && cd ../.. &&  node ./build/frontend_renaming/replace_icf_service.js && rm -rf dist/src/05
